results.definition: the context and environment in which something is set
graphic art consisting of the graphic or photographic representation of a visual percept
examples: he painted scenes from everyday life

results.definition: a situation treated as an observable object
examples: the religious scene in England has changed in the last century

results.definition: the visual percept of a region
the painted structures of a stage set that are intended to suggest a particular locale
examples: they worked all night painting the scenery

results.definition: a consecutive series of pictures that constitutes a unit of action in a film

examples: their parting was a sad scene

results.definition: a subdivision of an act of a play
examples: the first act has three scenes

results.definition: the place where some action occurs
examples: the police returned to the scene of the crime
